==== Notes ====
^1^Resolution is not properly recognised with installation of feisty. Should be 1280x800, but it's installed with only 800x600. According <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FixVideoResolutionHowto]]</nowiki> 
Run a reconfigure of xserver 

 sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg 

used vesa driver restarted X and it worked. 3D driver support is still in development.
